original_definition: 'pantry compartment' means an unfrozen compartment with a target temperature of 17 °C and storage conditions ranging from 14 °C to 20 °C, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
generated_definition: 'pantry compartment' means a compartment or cabinet used for storing food and kitchen supplies, typically located in a kitchen or dining area.

Article 2: ‘pantry compartment’ means an unfrozen compartment with a target temperature of 17 °C and storage conditions ranging from 14 °C to 20 °C, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
